meta.label: Send mails from a contacts dataset
meta.description:
The recipe takes as input a dataset of contacts, with one row per mail to send.

For each of the following fields, a value can either be provided in the configuration (if it is the same for each email to be sent) or be read from a column in the dataset

* Sender email
* Email subject
* Email body
* Optionally, attachements can be provided from another dataset (and be sent as CSV or Excel).
 The output dataset is only used for reporting. Email address should generally be in the form: 'Name <local@domain.com>'
